title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 92.2 - Certificate of valuation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 92.2 - Certificate of valuation

State Regulations

As soon as practicable after January 1 in each year, the superintendent will issue to each such company or society a certificate showing the aggregate amount, as determined on the basis of its filed valuation schedules, of the reserves on all such policies and contracts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
92.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
